subject: Surfing
Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The yacht designer Juan Kouyoumdjian and the big-wave surfer Laird Hamilton have joined forces to design equipment and promote stand-up paddleboarding.
snippet: The yacht designer Juan Kouyoumdjian and the big-wave surfer Laird Hamilton have joined forces to design equipment and promote stand-up paddleboarding.
